mpcsimplified.controllers package

Submodules

mpcsimplified.controllers.controller module

mpcsimplified.controllers.controller.template_model(stochasticity)[source]

Defines the mathematical model for the toggle switch in the form of differential equations (ODE).

Parameters

stochasticity (bool) – Determines the presence or absence of stochasticity in the model.

Returns

The do-mpc model instance.

Return type

do_mpc.model.Model

mpcsimplified.controllers.controller.template_mpc(model, setup_mpc)[source]

Configure and setup the MPC controller, given the model previously defined. It defines the cost function and the constraints on state variables and inputs.

Parameters

  • model (do_mpc.model.Model) – The do-mpc model instance.

  • setup_mpc (dict) – Controller parameters.

Returns

_description_

Return type

_type_

mpcsimplified.controllers.controller.template_simulator(model, t_step)[source]

Configure and setup the simulator.

Parameters

  • model (do_mpc.model.Model) – The do-mpc model instance.

  • t_step (float64) – Sampling time.

Returns

The do-mpc simulator instance.

Return type

do_mpc.simulator.Simulator
